channel.title: Dimensions on Dheepak's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Dimensions on Dheepak's blog

item.title: Multiple roles of a man
item.description: The 30s are tricky period. Till 20s you can survive with a student or young earner tag. In the late 20s, you experience what the freedom is. And, when you start feeling you can do whatever you can and reach wherever you want to in life. Now you’re in your 30s and most likely you got punched at your face.
